vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σῡλᾰγωγέω,
(σῦλον) carry off as booty, lead captive, τινα [NT+3rd c.AD+]
__II rob, despoil, τὸν οἶκον [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to capture
to take captive; carry off as a prey, or booty; metaphorically to make victims of fraud, Col. 2:8*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 擄獲, 搶奪 (作為戰利品) (西 2:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 掳获, 抢夺 (作为战利品) (西 2:8)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: làm bắt nhốt; bị mắc bẫy; trói buộc
